title: AI Governance & Policy
description: Explore the evolving landscape of AI regulation, safety initiatives, and ethical frameworks. Essential knowledge for anyone involved in AI strategy or compliance.
targetAudience: Policy makers, compliance officers, and business leaders navigating AI regulation
keyTakeaways: Understand major AI governance frameworks and their requirements
Know the key safety and alignment techniques being developed
Navigate regulatory requirements for AI deployment
Explain AI governance to stakeholders and leadership
